text: How to find duplicate elements in array using for loop in python like c/c++?
i have a list with duplicate elements:

code:
list_a=[1,2,3,5,6,7,5,2]

 tmp=[]

 for i in list_a:
     if tmp.__contains__(i):
         print i
     else:
         tmp.append(i)

text: i have used the above code to found the duplicate elements in the list_a.
i dont want to remove the elements form list.

But i want to use for loop here:
Normally C/C++ we use like this i guess:

code:
for (int i=0;i<=list_a.length;i++)
     for (int j=i+1;j<=list_a.length;j++)
         if (list_a[i]==list_a[j])
             print list_a[i]

text: how do we use like this in Python ?
